participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and creative, Emily enjoys exploring her hobbies and cherishes personal connections.
participant_1.background: I love to watch mystery movies when I'm not baking. I like to plant flowers in my gardens. My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food. I prefer a nice glass of wine with my cheese platter. I live in North Dakota.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outdoorsy and family-oriented, Jake values creativity and enjoys running to stay fit.
participant_2.background: I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation. I like to go running. I am angry at my coworker. My new home will be a place where I can express my creativity and individuality, and where I can feel safe and comfortable. I did not go to college because I run the family farm.

content.text: I am so glad to be home from work! I went to see Taylor Swift in concert in Minneapolis with my friend from out of town.
Hi! That sounds like a lot of fun! What was your favorite part of the concert?
I loved the way she interacted with the crowd. It felt so personal.
That sounds awesome! I'm a big fan of hers.
Oh cool! I live in Bismarck.
Oh nice! What do you do for fun?
I love to bake, garden, and watch mystery movies.
That sounds like fun! I like to go running and spend time with my family.
What is your favorite thing to do in the summer?
I love to go camping! What about you?
That sounds fun! I've never been fishing before.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
